turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you order a pizza from Papa John's for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure they have a specialty pizza with sausage and black olives

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok got it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can you tell them to exchange the black olives for onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Onions instead of black olives, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh you know what, they're all out of onions. Anything else instead

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it pineapple then

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much does it come out to?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $12.95 is the total

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do any sides come with it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No it's just the pizza by itself.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok that's all then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so a large sausage and pineapple. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok you have an account with them right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay it'll be ready in 25 minutes. They'll text you a receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, enjoy.
